00049 template<typename PROCESSOR>
00050 class repack_processor : public processor::base_iq {
00051 public:
00052   typedef boost::shared_ptr<repack_processor> sptr;
00053 
00054   typedef processor::base_iq::complex_type complex_type;
00055   typedef processor::base_iq::const_iterator const_iterator;
00056 
00057   typedef repack_buffer<complex_type> repack_buffer_type;
00058 
00059   repack_processor(boost::asio::io_service& service,
00060                    const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00061     : base_iq(config)
00062     , p_(service, config)
00063     , bufferLengthSec_(config.get<double>("Repack.<xmlattr>.bufferLength_sec"))
00064     , overlap_(   0.01*config.get<double>("Repack.<xmlattr>.overlap_percent"))
00065     , repack_buffer_(1024, overlap_) {}
00066 
00067   repack_processor(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00068     : base_iq(config)
00069     , p_(config)
00070     , bufferLengthSec_(config.get<double>("Repack.<xmlattr>.bufferLength_sec"))
00071     , overlap_(   0.01*config.get<double>("Repack.<xmlattr>.overlap_percent"))
00072     , repack_buffer_(1024, overlap_) {}
00073 
00074   virtual ~repack_processor() {}
00075 
00076   void process_iq(service::sptr sp,
00077                   const_iterator i0,
00078                   const_iterator i1) {
00079     if (!sp_)
00080       repack_buffer_.resize(size_t(0.5 + sp->sample_rate_Hz()*bufferLengthSec_));
00081 
00082     // save the service sptr: it is used in process_samples for constructing a service_repack sptr
00083     sp_ = sp;
00084     repack_buffer_.insert(this, i0, i1);
00085   }
00086   
00087 // protected:
00090   class service_repack : public service {
00091   public:
00092     typedef boost::shared_ptr<service_repack> sptr;
00093     virtual ~service_repack() {}
00094 
00095     static sptr make(service::sptr sp, boost::uint64_t counter) {
00096       return sptr(new service_repack(sp, counter));
00097     }
00098     virtual std::string     id()                  const { return sp_->id(); }
00099     virtual ptime           approx_ptime()        const { return t_; }
00100     virtual boost::uint16_t stream_number()       const { return sp_->stream_number(); }
00101     virtual std::string     stream_name()         const { return sp_->stream_name(); }
00102     virtual boost::uint32_t sample_rate_Hz()      const { return sp_->sample_rate_Hz(); }
00103     virtual double          center_frequency_Hz() const { return sp_->center_frequency_Hz(); }
00104     virtual float           offset_ppb()          const { return sp_->offset_ppb(); }
00105     virtual float           offset_ppb_rms()      const { return sp_->offset_ppb_rms(); }
00106 
00107     virtual void put_result(processor::result_base::sptr rp) {}
00108     virtual processor::result_base::sptr get_result(std::string name) const { return processor::result_base::sptr();  }
00109 
00110   protected:
00111   private:
00112     typedef boost::posix_time::time_duration time_duration;
00113     // counter is the distance (in samples) from sp_->approx_ptime()
00114     service_repack(service::sptr sp, boost::uint64_t counter)
00115       : sp_(sp)
00116       , t_(sp->approx_ptime() +
00117            time_duration(0,0,0,
00118                          counter*time_duration::ticks_per_second()/sp_->sample_rate_Hz())) {}
00119     const service::sptr sp_;
00120     const ptime         t_;
00121   } ;
00122 
00123 public:
00126   void process_samples(const_iterator beg, const_iterator end, boost::uint64_t counter) { 
00127     typename service_repack::sptr sp_repack(service_repack::make(sp_, counter));
00128     p_.process_iq(sp_repack, beg, end);
00129   }
00130 
00131 private:
00132   PROCESSOR          p_;
00133   const double       bufferLengthSec_;
00134   const double       overlap_;
00135   repack_buffer_type repack_buffer_;
00136   service::sptr      sp_;
00137 } ;
00140 #endif // _REPACK_PROCESSOR_HPP_cm100818_
